Very good Steve, "I'm not mad at you, I'm your friend"  is what the  lady 
=
said.  great job!  sf
 
 
In a message dated 2/18/2011 9:00:19 P.M. Eastern=
 Standard Time,

This =
is from the first 40 seconds of my session.  These files are  really 
good,=
 probably some of my best so far.  This is using my raw audio  sound 
metho=
d, instead of using radio words.
 
I believe with this method, we can use a=
nything to produce the  sounds.  
Although the sweep is almost maxed out fo=
r speed, the voices are  still clear 
and interactive regardless.
 
In one =
of the files, i'm conversing with a spirit.  The skeptics  can't 
possibly =
say this is just radio, with this method i finally have a leg  to 
stand on=
.
 
-Steve
